Title: Prohibits the sale or provision of any quantity of electronic liquid used to refill an electronic cigarette or cartridge
Summary: Prohibits the sale or provision of any quantity of electronic liquid used to refill an electronic cigarette or cartridge.
LawCode: Add ยง391-v, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the provision of any quantity of an electronic liquid
